mil3.2.9:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘dighamaddhanan’ti, kimetam addhanam nama”ti?
mil3.2.9:1.3: “Atito, maharaja, addha, anagato addha, paccuppanno addha”ti.
mil3.2.9:1.7: “Ye te, maharaja, sankhara atita vigata niruddha viparinata, so addha natthi, ye dhamma vipaka, ye ca vipakadhammadhamma, ye ca annatra patisandhim denti, so addha atthi.
mil3.2.9:1.8: Ye satta kalankata annatra uppanna, so ca addha atthi.
mil3.2.9:1.9: Ye satta kalankata annatra anuppanna, so addha natthi.
mil3.2.9:1.10: Ye ca satta parinibbuta, so ca addha natthi parinibbutatta”ti.
